predicate.note: Frames file for 'appeal' based on annotation-on-the-fly on the financial subcorpus.

example.name: no arg2
example.text: Commonwealth Edison is already appealing the underlying commission order.

example.name: appeal to and for
example.text: Jefferson appealed to the tribunal of the world for support of a revolution justified by the laws of nature and of nature's God.
example.arg: support of a revolution justified by the laws of nature and of nature's God

example.name: find attractive
example.text: ...an approach that *trace* has appealed to some choreographers...
